remarks: Value of inner product operation for the final constructed Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilip.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilip.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilip.v $e |- V = ( Base ` L ) $.
hlhilip.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilip.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilip.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilip.i $e |- ., = ( .i ` U ) $.
hlhilip.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hlhilip.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hlhilipval $p |- ( ph -> ( X ., Y ) = ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) ) $.
